name: Enderal: Forgotten Stories (Special Edition)
descr:
Enderal: Forgotten Stories (Special Edition) is a total conversion mod for Skyrim SE, which is now running on the 64 bit version of the [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/489830/The_Elder_Scrolls_V_Skyrim_Special_Edition/]TES V: Skyrim Special Edition[/url]. This version benefits heavily from the new rendering engine and features improved lighting effects, smoother image quality and the best possible performance & stability.

Enderal is a game modification that is set in its own world with its own landscape, lore and story. It offers an immersive open world, all for the player to explore, overhauled skill systems and gameplay mechanics and a dark, psychological storyline with believable characters.

Enderal is free and can be played by anyone owning a legal copy of TES V: Skyrim Special Edition. It is developed non-commercially by SureAI, the team behind the renowned Oblivion mod [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1014940/Nehrim_At_Fates_Edge/]Nehrim: At Fate´s Edge[/url] (and various other projects).
detail:
名称: Enderal: Forgotten Stories (Special Edition)
类型: 动作, 冒险, 角色扮演
开发商: SureAI
发行商: SureAI
系列: The Vyn Saga, SureAI
发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 18 日
review: 最近评测: 特别好评 (125) - 过去 30 天内的 125 篇用户评测中有 93% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (6,686) - 此游戏的 6,686 篇用户评测中有 93% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (6,686 篇中的 93%) 发布至今
最近评测: 特别好评 (125 篇中的 93%) 最近
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统 *: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 (64-bit Version)
处理器: Intel i5-750/AMD Phenom II X4-945
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GTX 470 1GB /AMD HD 7870 2GB
存储空间: 需要 22 GB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX compatible Sound card
附注事项: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition needs to be owned on Steam.
推荐配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统 *: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 (64-bit Version)
处理器: Intel i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
内存: 12 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA GTX 780 3GB /AMD R9 290 4GB
存储空间: 需要 22 GB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX compatible Sound card
附注事项: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition needs to be owned on Steam.
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
